articles.title: NCAA Tournament Bubble Watch: North Carolina, Kentucky and the blue-blood bubble - The Athletic
articles.description: Virginia, Gonzaga and Saint Mary's are headed to the NCAA Tournament. The Tar Heels and Wildcats can't say the same, at least not yet.
articles.content: There are many teams in and around the bubble right now. Fortunes change and winds shift; a proverbial butterfly flaps its basketball-metaphor wings at 10 p.m. ET on neutral court on a Thursday night… [+39633 chars]
